{"query": "mutation ($images: [Upload]) {userUploadAvatar(images: $images) {id, basename, url, type, hash, position, sizes, mime, url}}"}

graphql.query:
mutation {
    translationsSet(input: {
        place: SYSTEM
        group: "translation"
        translations: [
            # {key: "firebase.action_can_add_car_to_garage.title", translation: [
            #     {lang: "ru", text: "Car order"},
            #     {lang: "uk", text: "Car order"},
            # ]},
            # {key: "firebase.action_can_add_car_to_garage.body", translation: [
            #     {lang: "ru", text: "Can add car to garage"},
            #     {lang: "uk", text: "Can add car to garage"},
            # ]},
            # {key: "order.car.state.current", translation: [
            #     {lang: "ru", text: "current"},
            #     {lang: "uk", text: "current"},
            # ]},
            # {key: "order.car.state.done", translation: [
            #     {lang: "ru", text: "done"},
            #     {lang: "uk", text: "done"},
            # ]},
            {key: "order.car.state.skip", translation: [
                {lang: "ru", text: "dуу"},
                {lang: "uk", text: "dуу"},
            ]},
        ]
    }) {
            status
            message
            hash
    }
}
